discovery_rule.name: Available sensors bias
discovery_rule.description: Discover all physical bias sensors (inc. inside sfp)

item_prototype.name: Sensor: {#SNMPVALUE} - Data
item_prototype.description: Discovered data received from sensor

item_prototype.name: Sensor: {#SNMPVALUE} - Lower alarm threshold
item_prototype.description: Discovered lower alarm threshold received from sensor

item_prototype.name: Sensor: {#SNMPVALUE} - Lower warning threshold
item_prototype.description: Discovered lower warning threshold received from sensor

item_prototype.name: Sensor: {#SNMPVALUE} - Upper alarm threshold
item_prototype.description: Discovered upper alarm threshold received from sensor

item_prototype.name: Sensor: {#SNMPVALUE} - Upper warning threshold
item_prototype.description: Discovered upper warning threshold received from sensor

trigger_prototype.expression: {Cisco Switch SFP Sensors:ifBiasSensorData[{#SNMPVALUE}].last()}<{Cisco Switch SFP Sensors:ifBiasSensorLAT[{#SNMPVALUE}].last()} or {Cisco Switch SFP Sensors:ifBiasSensorData[{#SNMPVALUE}].last()}>{Cisco Switch SFP Sensors:ifBiasSensorUAT[{#SNMPVALUE}].last()}
trigger_prototype.name: ALERT: {#SNMPVALUE} is beyond thresholds

trigger_prototype.expression: {Cisco Switch SFP Sensors:ifBiasSensorData[{#SNMPVALUE}].last()}<{Cisco Switch SFP Sensors:ifBiasSensorLWT[{#SNMPVALUE}].last()} or {Cisco Switch SFP Sensors:ifBiasSensorData[{#SNMPVALUE}].last()}>{Cisco Switch SFP Sensors:ifBiasSensorUWT[{#SNMPVALUE}].last()}
trigger_prototype.name: WARNING: {#SNMPVALUE} is beyond thresholds

dependency.name: ALERT: {#SNMPVALUE} is beyond thresholds
dependency.expression: {Cisco Switch SFP Sensors:ifBiasSensorData[{#SNMPVALUE}].last()}<{Cisco Switch SFP Sensors:ifBiasSensorLAT[{#SNMPVALUE}].last()} or {Cisco Switch SFP Sensors:ifBiasSensorData[{#SNMPVALUE}].last()}>{Cisco Switch SFP Sensors:ifBiasSensorUAT[{#SNMPVALUE}].last()}
